description: Registry of feature items with stable UUIDs for cross-referencing in races, classes, and other items.

racial.name: Dwarven Resilience
racial.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

racial.name: Stonecunning
racial.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

racial.name: Craftsmen
racial.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Craft skill checks.

racial.name: Fey Ancestry
racial.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or magically put to sleep.

racial.name: Mask of the Wild
racial.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

racial.name: Trance
racial.description: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

racial.name: Arcane Training
racial.description: You can cast one cantrip of your choice from any spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

racial.name: Keen Mind
racial.description: You always know which way is north, and you can accurately recall anything you have seen or heard within the past month.

racial.name: Mountain Born
racial.description: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates.

racial.name: Stone Endurance
racial.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to reduce that damage by 1d10 + your CON modifier.

racial.name: Sure-Footed
racial.description: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws to avoid being knocked prone or shoved.

racial.name: Shadow Touched
racial.description: You have advantage on Stealth checks in dim light or darkness.

racial.name: Shadow Step
racial.description: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is in dim light or darkness.

racial.name: Chilling Presence
racial.description: When you hit a creature with an attack, you can reduce its speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
